Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a man you try and be macho

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: You remember the finals you lose as much as the ones you win

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: Then, for a hot three or four weeks I wanted to be a concert pianist

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: As a lifestyle you always being the focal point is innately unhealthy

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch television

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Close don't count in baseball. Close only counts in horseshoes and grenades

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't run 26 miles at five minutes a mile on good looks and a secret recipe

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: I searched for years I found no love. I'm sure that love will never be a product of plasticity

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started to play trumpet I was fortunate to learn very quickly

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Bravery is being the only one who knows you're afraid

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: Human morality is unthinkable without empathy

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is a great flirt

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many ingredients that are approved for use. You can't be an expert on all of them

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: My life. The life I'm living that's where all my inspiration comes from. Real life experiences

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to, as I say, build bridges where you can - but draw lines where you must

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe Android will be stronger in the developing world than it is in the developed world

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, feeling good is line drives to left field

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't be a rock star. I will be a legend

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've heard, 'May the Force be with you' about as many times as, 'Hey, how you doing?'

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Straight-up digital delivery will be the way the future works

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of thinking about the future is not to predict it but to raise people's hopes

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I think even the most beautiful person looks stupid on Skype

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: The rightful claim to dissent is an existential right of the individual

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinemascope is not for men, but for snakes and funerals

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: You got one life to live. So I'm living it the way I want to live it

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: The key factor in the vodka category is smoothness, and smoothness is what our vodka has

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you're telling a story from inside of you that's genuine, people connect with it

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Superheroes don't often get their powers in one fell swoop. It's like superhero puberty

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to be yourself and go full with confidence and be courageous

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my personal plights in this business is about playing 'The Sassy Black Girl.'

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: Boys are so much drama

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Alexander Gonzalez Inarritu is a great director. He's the one I first worked with. He's amazing

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity can be described as letting go of certainties

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of sarcastic. Not cynical but sarcastic

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: Women, by their nature, are not exceptional chess players: they are not great fighters

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: Nice guys finish first. If you don't know that, then you don't know where the finish line is

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Just keep taking chances and having fun

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for jamming and getting to know each other on the road

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Regardless of who wins, an election should be a time for optimism and fresh approaches

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: You choose your friends by their character and your socks by their color

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I have veterans in my family. But I didn't know anything about DAV, Disabled American Veterans

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to let go of your fear and anxiety of being judged by others

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to admit, if Oprah were a man, I would marry her

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Women who choose to breastfeed should get as much education and support as possible

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess, we were people who just dedicated to trying to get better

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Archery is something that I took up later and didn't know I had a natural aptitude for

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not worried, you're not reasonable

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Shadow Hero' was a dream to work on

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Live and think like a poor man and you'll always be OK

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a little like a message in a bottle, to be carried by the winds and the tides

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I write funny. If I can make my wife laugh, I know I'm on the right track

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be nice to turn off that incessant churning of consciousness

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: All of nationalism can be understood as a kind of collective narcissism

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the only billion dollar industry that tolerates abject failure

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: Time and tide wait for no man

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't really make fun of zombies. They're not liars. They're not cheats

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe 'loner' is too strong a word, but I've always enjoyed being on my own

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy going on motorcycle trips and stopping in small towns and enjoying drinks with the locals

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: I know from experience that you should never give up on yourself or others, no matter what

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Read my lips: no new taxes

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Originality is independence, not rebellion; it is sincerity, not antagonism

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: The path of sound credence is through the thick forest of skepticism

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: What Apple did for technology is brilliant, but they didn't do nothin' for our economy

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't do it unless you can imagine it

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't just hoard your ideas inside the ivory tower. You have to get them out into the world

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: Empathy is born out of the old biblical injunction 'Love the neighbor as thyself.'

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't just count your years, make your years count

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come from a traditional Tory background; it was urban and metropolitan

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention to other people's nightmares because they might be contagious

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is a villain in their own story. We're all the heroes of our own stories

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: We try, we fail, we posture, we aspire, we pontificate - and then we age, shrink, die, and vanish

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had great fans, and they've been so loyal over the years

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to live life, not just exist

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Boston. I love Fenway Park. I love Red Sox history. But in no way am I a Red Sox fan

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: I have lived much of my life among molecules. They are good company

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: To preach more than half an hour, a man should be an angel himself or have angels for hearers

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: The future has a way of arriving unannounced

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: The first sign of corruption in a society that is still alive is that the end justifies the means

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: You people married to Italian men, you know what it's like

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing the stunts. It's as simple as that

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not psycho... I just like psychotic things

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only young once, but you can be immature forever

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to make sure the Good Friday Agreement works

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I complicated? Nah, I'm interesting. I just like having a good time

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Importantly, I still give money to homeless people - and all other charities

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: My demons and I are not compatible. We never have been and never will be

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: So many of the kids on television have really nice clothes, perfect skin and hair

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: In the past, people were born royal. Nowadays, royalty comes from what you do

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - My songs were always about the tone of voice rather than the words

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm eventually gonna take the Daryl Hannah parts

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: Some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle and end

Quote.Author: Gillian Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Fresh Air' I listen to, like, every day

Quote.Author: Gina Bellman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love those connections that make this big old world feel like a little village

Quote.Author: Gina Gershon
Quote.QuoteValue: Size counts. That's all

Quote.Author: Gina Raimondo
Quote.QuoteValue: The single greatest under-utilized resource we have as a nation is women and girls

Quote.Author: Ginger Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!

Quote.Author: Ginni Rometty
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let others define you. You define yourself

Quote.Author: Giorgio Moroder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there is too much art involved in what I do

Quote.Author: Gisele Bundchen
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like when people judge me they're not judging me, because they don't know who I am

Quote.Author: Glenn Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have our inner demons

Quote.Author: Glenn Danzig
Quote.QuoteValue: To some people heavy metal is Motorhead and to others it's Judas Priest

Quote.Author: Gloria Estefan
Quote.QuoteValue: The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice

Quote.Author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo
Quote.QuoteValue: I sow; my successor reaps. This is the majesty of democracy

Quote.Author: Gloria Swanson
Quote.QuoteValue: At 26 I felt myself a victim rather than a victor in the realm of pictures

Quote.Author: Golda Meir
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot and must not try to erase the past merely because it does not fit the present

Quote.Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile

Quote.Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds

Quote.Author: Gordon Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When something really matters, you should never give up or give in

Quote.Author: Gordon Ramsay
Quote.QuoteValue: Cooking today is a young man's game, I don't give a bollocks what anyone says

Quote.Author: Grace Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I was skinny as a rail and had high cheekbones and a very interesting face - or so I was told

Quote.Author: Grace Slick
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to wear fur. They make such great fakes. There's no reason to kill an animal

Quote.Author: Graham Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Human nature is not black and white but black and grey

Quote.Author: Graydon Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man in the back of their minds would like to own a bar or a racehorse

Quote.Author: Greg Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Even gang members imagine a future that doesn't include gangs

Quote.Author: Greg Gutfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel like a pro, not like a hobo. That's my motto

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes are defined by their villains - Batman is nothing if he doesn't have Two-Face

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a lot of things like running hills and larger amounts of reps in the gym

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I play every show like it's my last. Fortunately, that's never turned out to be the case

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Science, like art, religion, commerce, warfare, and even sleep, is based on presuppositions

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are blessed, you are blessed, whether you are married or single

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've had something for more than six months, and it's still not repaired, it's clutter

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: The most valuable live thing for me is when people look like they're having a good time

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypocrisy is the tribute that vice pays to virtue

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I'm interested in playing lots of different complex women

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Let no man in the world live in delusion. Without a Guru none can cross over to the other shore

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: Free time keeps me going

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: A symphony must be like the world. It must contain everything

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Short of screaming-hot Thai food, everything can be suitable for kids too

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have to put someone on a pedestal, put teachers. They are society's heroes

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope springs eternal, even in politics

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short and you've got to get the most out of it

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone loves a slash of red lipstick

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure how healthy bacon is in general, but I know it's incredibly delicious

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: If you come from Paris to Budapest you think you are in Moscow

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: They cannot divide us by saying that you're middle class or you're lower class

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't done a marathon for a long time. So we'll see. I will need good luck

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom taught me to live by the three p's: to always be passionate, persistent, and prepared

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: My type of basketball is about how to create space, how to maneuver, how to get your shot off

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to waste money, than it is to waste time. You can always get more money

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a lot of time with a crown on my head

Quote.Author: Halsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear my personality on my sleeve, for sure, and my look is constantly changing because so am I

Quote.Author: Halston Sage
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite weekend activity is riding bikes to breakfast

Quote.Author: Hamza Yusuf
Quote.QuoteValue: All of the people are the dependents of Allah

Quote.Author: Hank Azaria
Quote.QuoteValue: Godzilla's a monster for the '90s. He's been working out

Quote.Author: Hanna Rosin
Quote.QuoteValue: If men can quilt and take over the kitchen, then women can pick up a wrench and fix a leaky pipe

Quote.Author: Hannah Simone
Quote.QuoteValue: Working opposite Max Greenfield is the best job in the world. He's just incredible

Quote.Author: Hannibal Buress
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is basically self-deprecation

Quote.Author: Hans Hofmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Every art expression is rooted fundamentally in the personality and temperament of the artist

Quote.Author: Hansika Motwani
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I am asked about my personal relationships, I politely reply, 'No comments.'

Quote.Author: Harlan Coben
Quote.QuoteValue: Make no mistake, adolescence is a war. No one gets out unscathed

Quote.Author: Harmony Korine
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema sustains life. It captures death in its progress

Quote.Author: Harold Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't meet the standards, then you don't qualify

Quote.Author: Harold Pinter
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so easy for propaganda to work, and dissent to be mocked

Quote.Author: Harold Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Throwing money at something doesn't really create - forgive me that onerous word - art

Quote.Author: Harold Ramis
Quote.QuoteValue: I never work just to work. It's some combination of laziness and self-respect

Quote.Author: Harold S. Geneen
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions

Quote.Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn

Quote.Author: Harrison Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance

Quote.Author: Harry Browne
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing is to concentrate upon what you can do - by yourself, upon your own initiative

Quote.Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: My Dad is my hero

Quote.Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you laugh at in others, laughs at yourself

Quote.Author: Harry Houdini
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a great admirer of mystery and magic. Look at this life - all mystery and magic

Quote.Author: Harry Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I love this club, and to be wearing number 10 for Tottenham is amazing for me. I could not resist

Quote.Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything passes. Nobody gets anything for keeps. And that's how we've got to live

Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, job titles don't matter. Everyone is in sales. It's the only way we stay in business

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody's like everybody else, and everybody's different from everybody else

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace cannot be unilateral

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have the best of everything

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man of genius sees the world at a different angle from his fellows, and there is his tragedy

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I get inspiration from my everyday life

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in control of my life, not anyone in Hollywood

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: Politicians often claim secrecy is necessary for good governance or national security

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I meet people who seem really sweet and unassuming, I kind of wonder about them

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wear short skirts you get your femininity back

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as standing still

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, and it's my third movie with Richard. American Gigolo was my first

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: Never underestimate the power of the ocean

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course God will forgive me; that's His job

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: People kill for love. They die for love

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is not important unless you're a cheese

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're constantly frightened of being unhappy, how bloody exhausting must that be?

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have to, I can do anything. I am strong, I am invincible, I am Woman

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're in the news business, you always expect the unexpected

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my mouth just opens and I spontaneously say things that occur to me

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, drawing generates thinking and vice versa

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're young, you're fearless and more creative, more of an outsider

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late

Quote.Author: Henri Bergson
Quote.QuoteValue: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly

Quote.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self

Quote.Author: Henri Matisse
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always flowers for those who want to see them

Quote.Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote.QuoteValue: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend

Quote.Author: Henri Poincare
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things

Quote.Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A forest bird never wants a cage

Quote.Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep working hard, and this will pay off

Quote.Author: Henry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends are born, not made

Quote.Author: Henry Cavill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think Americans look bad in spandex

Quote.Author: Henry Fielding
Quote.QuoteValue: Guilt has very quick ears to an accusation

Quote.Author: Henry James
Quote.QuoteValue: In museums and palaces we are alternate radicals and conservatives

Quote.Author: Henry Kissinger
Quote.QuoteValue: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full

Quote.Author: Henry Louis Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Diversity doesn't mean black and white only

Quote.Author: Henry Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive

Quote.Author: Henry Paulson
Quote.QuoteValue: In just about every area of society, there's nothing more important than ethics

Quote.Author: Henry Petroski
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing

Quote.Author: Henry Samueli
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed in hockey, you need teamwork

Quote.Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is what the heart needs all the time

Quote.Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote.QuoteValue: Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody expects of you. Never excuse yourself

Quote.Author: Henry Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Assumptions are the termites of relationships

Quote.Author: Heraclitus
Quote.QuoteValue: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man

Quote.Author: Herb Caen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met

Quote.Author: Herbert Hoover
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity

Quote.Author: Herbert Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: When a man's knowledge is not in order, the more of it he has the greater will be his confusion

Quote.Author: Herbie Hancock
Quote.QuoteValue: I think risk-taking is a great adventure. And life should be full of adventures

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: Stupid people are ruining America

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: I am, as I am; whether hideous, or handsome, depends upon who is made judge

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: For a man wins nothing better than a good wife, and then again nothing deadlier than a bad one

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to show people how there are variations and different interpretations of good and evil

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people assume I'm perfect. I'm not. I make mistakes. I do things I regret. I'm stubborn

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: Hindsight is the historian's necessary vice

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: You only have one life and if you're not doing what you love, what's the point?
